sentence.Network_en: Once they had left Key Biscayne, Rogers and Laird quickly reversed themselves.
sentence.Network_cn: 罗杰斯和莱尔德一离开比斯坎岛,很快就变了卦.

sentence.Network_en: He would get rid of Rogers and Laird at the earliest opportunity.
sentence.Network_cn: 只要有机会,他就会尽早抛弃罗杰斯和莱尔德.

sentence.Network_en: Laird and Nixon kept their counsel.
sentence.Network_cn: 莱尔德和尼克松不发表意见.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: Scots form of lord

entry.def: A laird is someone who owns a large area of land in Scotland.
